column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The full experience of Bavette's is fantastic. Just walking in the door takes you back into another era. The menu is simple
column2: yet very well executed. The salmon tartar with crème fraîche is a perfect start for a great meal. The cocktails are very well made and the bar tenders friendly. The wine list is small
column3: but has some phenomenal options. I highly recommend making an evening out of your time at Bavette's.
